Module Contents

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   pyslam.capture_old.CaptureGroup.CaptureGroup




.. py:class:: CaptureGroup(listOfCaptureUIDs)

   A group of capture object UIDs together. Just a type that wraps around a
   list.
